meta.note: This is the Post that was created from this workflow and published in the Posts collection.

options.text: Congrats! This content workflow has been completed. You can review the final published post below.

Review the content ideas belows. The rating is AI-generated based on confidence level of the serving the target audience and popularity.Edit any of the ideas as needed and Save them.

Once you're ready to generate an article based on a specific idea, use the **Generate Article** flow in the right sidebar to automatically generate a full article.

Review and edit the generated post below. Use Comments in the right sidebar to collaborate with team members.

There are flows to generate images and social posts to speed up your workflow even faster.

When you're ready to publish, use the **Schedule Post** flow in the right sidebar to publish your content in the Posts collection.
Use the **Generate Image** flow in the right sidebar to create images using OpenAI Dall•E, based on a templated image style. Manage your [image styles](/admin/content/image_styles).
Use the **Generate Social Posts** flow in the right sidebar to automatically create social media posts to promote this article. Manage your [post templates](/admin/content/templates).

Add your inputs like notes, audio, videos, or images to be used as context for AI generation.
Make sure you Save (CMD+S or Ctrl+S) after you've added your inputs.

Once you've added your files and notes, use the **Generate Content Ideas** flow in the right sidebar to automatically generate content ideas.

meta.note: The type of input affects how it's processed in the workflow. Audio/Video files will be automatically transcribed. Images will be passed to OpenAI Vision API. Text notes will be passed as additional context when generating ideas and articles.
What is the base URL for your Directus instance?
What is the default folder you'd like to use to store AI generated images?
Create your OpenAI API key from within [their dashboard](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
Create your Deepgram API key from within [their dashboard](https://console.deepgram.com/)
Create your DeepL API key from within [their dashboard](https://www.deepl.com/your-account/keys)

options.text:
**For ease of testing and development, API keys are not stored as encrypted in the database in this project.**

Take care to protect the keys and not provide public access or internal access to team members who don't need this information. Access to this `globals` collection is restricted to only Administrators by default within [Access Control](/admin/settings/roles).

It is recommended to move these keys to environment variables or some other secure secret store before going to production.

meta.note: What is the name of this color? Dall•E seems to do better with color names than specific hex codes.
The content workflow that this post was generated from.

options.text: Automatically generate translations for different languages using the **Translate Post** flow in the right sidebar.
